AI Description: Infernal is a software for searching DNA sequence databases for RNA structure and sequence similarities. It is used to align RNA sequences to RNA sequence and structural models.
Core Features:
1. Searching DNA sequence databases for RNA structure and sequence similarities
2. Aligning RNA sequences to RNA sequence and structural models
3. Building covariance models
4. Detecting RNA homologs
General Tags: RNA Sequence Analysis, Bioinformatics, Sequence Alignment
